menu.name: Pancakes
menu.description: Fluffy pancakes served with syrup, fresh berries, and whipped cream.

menu.name: Avocado Toast
menu.description: Sliced avocado on toasted sourdough bread, topped with a poached egg.

menu.name: Classic Omelette
menu.description: A three-egg omelette with your choice of fillings, served with toast.

menu.name: French Toast
menu.description: Golden brown French toast served with maple syrup and powdered sugar.

menu.name: Granola Bowl
menu.description: A healthy granola bowl topped with yogurt, fresh fruit, and honey.

menu.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
menu.description: A healthy salad with grilled chicken, mixed greens, and balsamic dressing.

menu.name: Cheeseburger
menu.description: Classic cheeseburger with lettuce, tomato, and your choice of cheese.

menu.name: Chocolate Milkshake
menu.description: Creamy chocolate milkshake topped with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

menu.name: Strawberry Milkshake
menu.description: Delicious strawberry milkshake topped with whipped cream and fresh strawberries.

menu.name: Grilled Salmon
menu.description: Fresh grilled salmon served with steamed vegetables and garlic butter sauce.

menu.name: Steak Frites
menu.description: Tender steak served with crispy French fries and garlic butter sauce.
